261769.「<pc>さん 待っていたわ。\n さあ 煉獄のつるぎを渡して。:
<pc> I've been waiting for you. Now
give me the Purgatory Sabre.

261771.「今は ふざけている場合じゃないのよ。\n 煉獄のつるぎを 渡してちょうだい。<:
Now is not the time to joke around. Give me
the Purgatory Sabre.<yesno><close>

261774.「フフフッ。兄さんも <pc>さんが\n 心配で 来てくれたみたい。:
Hmmm.... I guess my brother was worried about
<pc> too, so he came to see me.

261775.「フン。お前は\n ウィーヌムをおびき寄せるための エサだ。\n 勝手に死なれた:
Hmph. You're just bait to lure Wienum. I don't
want you to die on your own.

261776.「さあ 始めましょう。\n 集中して 自分の心と 向き合って。\n 大丈夫 自分:
Let's begin. Concentrate. Face your mind. It's
okay. Trust yourself...

261777.「魂を 魔に染めし者よ。\n 汝のすべてを 剣の前に示せ。:
O soul dyed by the devil, show me all that
thou art before the sword.

261778.「剣の呼びかけに応え\n 魔の波動よ 目覚めたまえ！:
Answer the call of the sword, demon wave, and
awaken!

261780.「みんな 魔物にやられちまった。\n 死にたくない 死にたくないよ……。\n 助:
Everyone, I've been killed by a monster. I
don't wanna die, I don't wanna die... help me
<pc>...

261781.「<pc>さん 無事ね？ 無事なのね？\n 本当に 良かった……！:
<pc> Are you safe? You're safe? I'm
so glad you're okay.

261782.「儀式は成功よ。\n ……ここまで 強力な魔の波動を\n 制御することが できる:
The ritual was Hit. I never thought I'd be
able to control such powerful demonic
vibrations.

261783.「あなたは 過去と絶望と向き合い\n その痛みを……すべてを 受け入れたのね。\:
You faced your past, your despair, your
pain... and you accepted it all. You decided
to live with it all.

261784.「本当に 強い人……。\n あなたは 正真正銘 最強の魔剣士のひとりよ。\n こ:
You really are one of the strongest demon
swordsmen alive. Now you can fight with
Wienum.

261785.「まさか 覚醒の儀を乗り越えるとはな。\n 魔剣士として 少しは認めてやらんでも:
I never thought you would get through the
awakening ceremony. As a demon swordsman, I
can't help but admit it a little.

261786.「おめでとうございまーーすっ！\n ウフッ。<pc>さんも 覚醒の儀を終えて\n:
Congratulations! Ugh.... <pc> has
also finished the awakening ceremony and looks
much more delicious.

261787.「<pc>さんの覚醒を 祝して\n 食事会でも いかがです？\n もちろん ディ:
How about a dinner party to celebrate
<pc>'s awakening? With Coral, of
course!

261788.「前菜は <pc>さん！\n メインディッシュは ディゼルさん！\n 極上の魔剣:
The appetizer is by <pc>! And for the
main course, Mr. Diezel! A full course of the
finest demon swordsman!

261789.「ごちそうのためなら 逃げも隠れもしません。\n ワタクシを殺す 絶好のチャンス:
I won't run and hide for the feast. This is
your chance to kill me. You don't want to miss
this, do you?

261790.「レビュール街道南の 西にある\n 古跡の井戸へ いらっしゃい。\n お待ちして:
Come to the Historic Well, west well, south of
Reviewle Highway South. We'll be waiting for
you... yeeeeeeeeeeeeeee...!

261792.「フフ……やっとだ。\n やっと 殺せる。: Fufu... finally. Finally, I can kill it.

261794.「魔の波動が 一気にふくれ上がって\n 抑えられなくなっていた。\n このままじ:
The demon's surge was soaring and
uncontrollable. At this rate, my brother
will...

261796.「兄さんは ウィーヌムを追って\n レビュール街道南の 西にある\n 古跡の井戸:
Your brother must have followed Weinum to the
Historic Well west well south of Reviewle
Highway South.

261797.「今の状態で ウィーヌムと戦ったら\n 兄さんの 魔の波動が暴走して\n 取り返:
If you fight Wienum in your current state,
your brother's demon wave will go out of
control and he will be irretrievable. So...

261798.「……危険なことを 任せてしまって\n ごめんなさい。兄さんを 助けて……！:
I'm sorry I put you in charge of something so
dangerous. Please help my brother.

261799.「ヒヒヒィ！ いいですよ ディゼルさんッ！\n よだれが出そうなほど ステキな憎:
Hee-hee! That's good, Mr. Diezel! You're so
slobbery and loathsome!

261800.「……ウィーヌム！\n 貴様は！ ここで殺すッ！！: ...Wienum! You! I'll kill you right here!

261802.「ヒャハハハハァッ！ すばらしい！！\n こんなに心が躍るのは いつぶりでしょう:
Hyahahahahaha! That's wonderful! When was the
last time your heart was this excited!

261803.「おやぁ……<cs_pchero>さん！\n 前菜が遅れるなんて いけませんねぇ:
Oh my...<cs_pchero>! I shouldn't be late
with the appetizers. I started the main dish
first.

261804.「極上の魔の波動を持つ ごちそうが ふたり。\n ジュル……！ たまりませんねぇ:
Two feasts with the most exquisite magical
vibrations. Jeez...! I can't get enough...! I
think I'm going to lose my mind...

261805.「……コイツの助けなど 必要ない。\n 貴様は 俺ひとりで片付ける！:
I don't need his help. I'll take care of you
myself!

261806.「俺たち家族が受けた以上の 痛みと絶望を\n 貴様に返してやるッ！:
I will give you back more pain and despair
than our family has ever suffered!

261807.「うんうん……ふたりとも ゾクゾクするほど\n おいしそうですよ。しかし まだ\:
They both look so delicious that it makes me
tingle. But I still feel like it's a little
short...

261808.「では 最後の仕上げといきますか。: Now let's put the finishing touches on it.

261810.「存分に憎みなさい 絶望なさい！\n あなたたちの 魔の波動を\n すべて たい:
Hate me to the fullest. Despair! I will sweep
away all your demonic vibrations!

261812.「父と母の仇！ 覚悟しろ ウィーヌムッ！:
Avenge your father and mother! Brace
yourselves, Wienum!

261815.「……なーんにも 覚えていないんですね。\n 本気で ワタクシがアナタの両親を\:
You don't remember anything, do you? Do you
really believe that I killed your parents?

261817.「ワタクシはただ 親とケンカして\n 両親への不満をためこんでいた 子供がいたか:
Myself, I just had a kid who had a fight with his parents and was holding onto his frustration with them, so I planted the poison
of despair in his taunts.

261818.「ワタクシは アナタのご両親には\n 指いっぽん 触れていません。\n 実際に:
I never laid a finger on your parents. In
fact, the man who killed them both...

261819.「彼らの かわいい かわいい息子。\n そう アナタのことですよ。\n ディゼル:
Their cute, cute son. Yes, I'm talking about
you. Mr. Diezel?

261820.「……ウ ウソだ。そんな……。: Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no...

261821.「ウソなものですか。ワタクシの絶望の毒に\n 我を忘れたアナタは ナイフで\n:
Is that a lie? You, who forgot yourself in the poison of my despair, stabbed your father and mother in the chest with a knife and killed
them.

261822.「ククッ……他でもない アナタの手で\n おふたりは 死んだんです。\n 本当に:
Kukk...by your hand, of all people, you two
died. Have you really forgotten?

261826.「父さん 母さん……！\n 俺は……なんてことを……ッ！！: Dad, Mom...! I... what have I done...!

261827.「アハハハハハハッ！ 思いだしましたか？\n 愛する両親に ナイフを突き刺した\:
Ahahahahahahaha! Do you remember? That sad but
wonderful moment when you stuck the knife into
your loving parents!

261828.「妹さんも かわいそうに。\n お兄さんに 大好きな両親を殺され\n 彼女も 顔:
Poor little sister. Her brother killed her
parents, whom she loved very much, and she has
a big scar on her face and heart.

261829.「アガサ……お前は すべて知っていて\n 俺を……。: Agatha... you knew all this and you...

261831.「ブラーヴォー！ すべて ワタクシの計画通り！\n ずっと この瞬間を 待ってい:
Bravo! It's all going according to my plan! I've been waiting for this moment my whole life! Mr. Diezel... your desperation is the
best!

261832.「痛いでしょう？ 苦しいでしょう？\n 私が今 楽にしてさしあげましょう……。:
It hurts, doesn't it? Are you in pain? Let me
make you comfortable now...

261834.「ウマァーイ！ ウマすぎる！！\n 今まで味わったことのない 深く暗い絶望……。:
Umaaay! Umaumauma! The deepest, darkest
despair I've ever tasted... I can eat as much
as I want. I can eat as much as I want...

261836.「バカな！？ 喰っても喰っても 無くならない！\n 絶望がどんどん ふくれ上がっ:
Nonsense! I keep eating and eating, but it
won't go away! The despair is growing...

261837.「このままじゃ は 破裂するゥ……苦しい……！: If I don't do something, it will burst...

261838.「だが……もはや 死んでもいい！\n もっとだ！ この美食を もっと味わいたいッ:
But... no longer! More! I want to taste more
of this delicacy! Hee-hee-hee-hee...!

272393.つるぎの酒場にいる アガサに\nディゼルに起こった異変を 報告しにいこう。:
Let's report to Agatha at Doom 'n' Gloom
what has happened to Diezel.
